name: A KPOP Music Radio App - Korean Pop Music For Fans Of for K-pop,snsd,exo,Big Bang,2PM,Beast,TXXQ,Boyfriend,U-Kiss,Block B,Infinite,Mblaq,CN Blue,FTIsland,GDragon,Sungri,Girls GEneration,Yoona,Yuri,BOA
name_original: A KPOP Music Radio App - Korean Pop Music For Fans Of for K-pop,snsd,exo,Big Bang,2PM,Beast,TXXQ,Boyfriend,U-Kiss,Block B,Infinite,Mblaq,CN Blue,FTIsland,GDragon,Sungri,Girls GEneration,Yoona,Yuri,BOA
description:
This app is a must for all K-Pop Music Lovers!

Listen to different genres of Kpop from your favorite Kpop idols like Big Bang, EXO, SNSD (Girls Generation), 2NE1, A Pink, 15&, IU, 4Minute, 2PM, CN Blue, SHINee, Tasty, Inifinite, B.A.P. B1A4, Super Junior and more!

Listen live to the latest and best K-Pop music - all in one convenient place without ads or presenters - just the music.

**FEATURES**
- Apple TV integration
- Background play and control - carry on with other apps while still listening to your favorite KPOP
- Ability to pause music
- Song data and controls shows on lock screen
- Share the KPOP Music Radio love with Twitter, Facebook,Email, SMS and Youtube integration
- Last.fm integration let's you see the song name, artist name and album cover while you're listening.
- Dedicated KPOP music channels with just music, no talking, just the music

Have a request for a station or a specific KPOP music station or want something added to the app? Then send us a tweet or a Facebook message at: http://www.facebook.com/kpopmusicradio1

If you enjoy the app, please leave us a review, we appreciate the feedback!
